property.name: color
property.description: Text color for FileUpload controls.

property.name: background-color
property.description: Background color for FileUpload controls.

property.name: background-image
property.description: Background image for FileUpload controls.

property.name: background-position
property.description: Background image position for FileUpload controls.

property.name: background-repeat
property.description: Background image repetition for FileUpload controls.

property.name: border
property.description: Border for FileUpload controls.

property.name: border-top
property.description: The top side border for FileUpload controls.

property.name: border-right
property.description: The right side border for FileUpload controls.

property.name: border-bottom
property.description: The bottom side border for FileUpload controls.

property.name: border-left
property.description: The left side border for FileUpload controls.

property.name: border-radius
property.description: Border radius. The border radius has no effect if an enhanced border, like "inset" or "outset" is used.

property.name: opacity
property.description: The opacity of the FileUpload controls. A value between 0 and 1.

property.name: animation
property.description: Supports animations-types "hoverIn" and "hoverOut". Others are ignored.

property.name: cursor
property.description: Control's cursor.

property.name: padding
property.description: Padding (inner distance) for FileUpload controls.

property.name: spacing
property.description: Space between text and image.

property.name: font
property.description: Font for FileUpload controls text.

property.name: text-shadow
property.description: Shadow for text.

style.name: BORDER
style.description: Indicates that the FileUpload controls should have a border.

state.name: hover
state.description: Applies while the user hovers over a FileUpload control.

state.name: pressed
state.description: Applies while a FileUpload control is pressed.

element.name: FileUpload-FocusIndicator
element.description: The frame that is drawn when the FileUpload control is focused.

property.name: background-color
property.description: The fill-color of the frame.

property.name: border
property.description: The border of the frame. 3D-styles inset, outset, etc are not supported.

property.name: border-top
property.description: The top side border of the frame.

property.name: border-right
property.description: The right side border of the frame.

property.name: border-bottom
property.description: The bottom side border of the frame.

property.name: border-left
property.description: The left side border of the frame.

property.name: padding
property.description: The padding between the frame and the FileUpload control text. If this is set to "0px", margin will be used to layout the FocusIndicator.

property.name: margin
property.description: The margin between the FileUpload control border and the frame. Only used if padding is set to "0px".

property.name: opacity
property.description: The opacity of the indicator. A value between 0 and 1.
